/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. The buildings, mostly white and gray, are adorned with red and green accents, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. 

The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. A car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. 

In the background, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and street.
